mapper.select: select * from tbl_qna order by qna_no
select * from tbl_csReceive order by csReceive_order
SELECT A.ano, A.order_code, A.ask_contnet, A.ask_title, A.ask_date, B.user_id FROM tbl_askproduct A, tbl_orderproduct B WHERE A.order_code = B.order_code
select * from tbl_csCheck order by csCheck_order
